name: SCAR Script
summary: Learn about .SCAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When a SCAR script executes, it browses the screen for specific text, objects, or colors. The script may then submit keystrokes or mouse button click events, which can be used to automatically play games.
NOTE: While SCAR scripts are most commonly used for video games, they can be used to automate any human interaction with a computer.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
